en.text:
Privacy Policy

1. Introduction

This privacy policy stipulates how personal information is handled on websites owned by The Infinity's, such as https://the-infinitys.f5.si, https://the-infinitys.infinityon.com, https://the-infinitys.onrender.com (hereinafter referred to as "this site"). Users of this site (hereinafter referred to as "users") must fully understand the contents of this privacy policy before using this site.

2. How to obtain personal information

This site obtains the following personal information from users through the contact page using Google Form.

  • Email address
  • User name for SNS, etc.

3. Purpose of use of personal information

Personal information acquired on this site will be used for the following purposes.

  • Replying to questions received from users
  • Requests for review of web pages

4. Provision of personal information to third parties

This site will not provide acquired personal information to third parties.

5. Scope of responsibility

This site bears no responsibility whatsoever to users of this site.

6. Changes to the Privacy Policy

This website may change this privacy policy without notice. The changed privacy policy will take effect when it is posted on this website.

7. Contact us

For inquiries regarding this privacy policy, please contact us at the following URL.

The Infinity's contact

Date of enactment: June 21, 2024

Date of revision: June 21, 2024
